A version of '''[[Indev 0.31]]''' was released on '''January 29, 2010''', at 22:09 UTC<ref>{{Cite IRC logs|Adura|tz=standard|file=2010-01-29_#minecraft.log|"17:09:20 <Notch> vede: Now?"}}</ref>.
This version attempted to fix a focus bug, but this was unsuccessful.
This version therefore has no changes at all.

== Fixes ==
* Attempted to fix focus bug with mouse and keyboard when fullscreen mode switching on Linux again, but it was unsuccessful.<ref>{{Cite IRC logs|Adura|tz=standard|file=2010-01-29_#minecraft.log|"17:11:04 <vede> Still no luck, Notch."..."17:11:14 <Notch> vede: Then I really don't know what to do :-("}}</ref>
